name: Miracle Wellness Center LLC
specialty: Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center)

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Miracle Wellness Center LLC is a Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center) provider based in Phoenix, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $9.0M in Medicaid payments across 24K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $9.0M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
